specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric. Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Crepe Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Dresses, Blouses, Partywear, Abaya, Bridal
